Name: Comet
Fate: Arrived for breaking up at Troon on 23 June 1962
Range: 4,675 nautical miles (8,658 km; 5,380 mi) at 20 knots (37 km/h; 23 mph)
Armament:
4 × single 4.5 in (114 mm) DP guns
1 × twin 40 mm (1.6 in) AA gun
2 × single 2-pdr (40 mm) AA guns 
2 × single 20 mm (0.8 in) AA guns
2 × quadruple 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes
2 throwers and 2 racks for 35 depth charges
